ModMetaData.name: Make Early Components - Stuffified Alloys Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description: This mod allows you to create components out of any metal at a Smithy. The process is expensive early on but becomes much cheaper with the Component Assembly Table. This version requires Stuffified Construction and Cupros Alloys.\n\n Mod Version: 0.17.1.2
